List Topic Coverage

cha_coverage.Rd

List all combinations of population, periods, and geographic layers available for a given topic. To search for individual topics use cha_topics.

Usage

cha_coverage(topic_key, progress = TRUE)

Arguments

topic_key

3-8 letter ID uniquely identifying a topic.

progress

Display a progress bar?

Value

Topic coverage tibble

Examples

cha_coverage("POP", progress = FALSE)
#> # A tibble: 1,666 × 6
#>    population_key population_name population_grouping period_key layer_key
#>    <chr>          <chr>           <chr>               <chr>      <chr>    
#>  1 ""             Full population ""                  2018-2022  place    
#>  2 ""             Full population ""                  2022       place    
#>  3 ""             Full population ""                  2017-2021  place    
#>  4 ""             Full population ""                  2021       place    
#>  5 ""             Full population ""                  2016-2020  place    
#>  6 ""             Full population ""                  2020       place    
#>  7 ""             Full population ""                  2015-2019  place    
#>  8 ""             Full population ""                  2019       place    
#>  9 ""             Full population ""                  2014-2018  place    
#> 10 ""             Full population ""                  2018       place    
#> # ℹ 1,656 more rows
#> # ℹ 1 more variable: layer_name <chr>
